channel.title: Help with GFX's?
channel.description:
Hello again, I have adding skillcape emotes to my delta server. It uses blurr client. I have added the ints to source. Made the button. But how to do with the gfx'? I have control panel on my server. I have added gfx's to my models folder i have added the ints to class23 compiled logged in writted add model ****(this i changed "****" to my models id's).So how i said i my control panel is fucntion that lets to force gfx's. I looked all gfx's ags , sgs, bgs etc.. But when i tried the skillcape gfx's they wasnt working. And it says the animation of gfx example 4549 i forced animation and its just standing animation. Maybe anyone can help me or post link of tutorial that help's to add fully working skillcape emote's to delta.
Thanks <33

item.title: Help with GFX's?
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

I have tried corby emotes suxxx
Valentino project suxx now imma working on it it loads the gfx only from south and gfx is faster than emote :DDDD
tried to fix but it got errors

Anyone got tutorial that remove the weapons when doing emote?
Cuz im doing example attack emote and it shows me gs in my hands while doing emote + it dont loads item for it like axe for woodcutting pestle for herblore etc…
